text: Yeh log jinhon ne dawat e haqq ko qabool karne se inkar kardiya hai, khwah ehle kitab mein se hon ya mushrik hon, hargiz yeh pasand nahin karte ke tumhare Rubb ki taraf se tumpar koi bhalayi nazil ho, magar Allah jisko chahta hai apni rehmat ke liye chun leta hai aur woh bada fazal farmane wala hai
